name: Portrayal Demo
description:
A historical conversational puzzle game: play as a disgruntled painter uncovering gossip and secrets of Regency "society" life to find a killer in their midst. Under the guise of painting portraits, the artist Nathaniel converses with each subject, subtly interrogating them for information regarding a mysterious murder.

Made using Fungus with Unity.
Sprites made with picrew: Dandy maker by jagodowa_poezja. (picrew.me/image_maker/334308)
